channel.title: Copy of Digg top 24 hours
channel.description: RSS feed with direct links to popular technology articles. based on superdigg pipe

item.title: [+2970] World isn’t full of dishonest People [letter]
[+2350] 14 YO helps lost 3 YO find mother, is arrested for abduction
item.description: He saw a 3-year-old girl without a parent. If he had it to do all over again, if he could see the cops, the handcuffs, the TV cameras and the jail cell all awaiting him, I imagine the last thing he would have done was try to help her. But he did.

item.title: [+1806] Best World Cup sign so far... (pic)

item.description: new in game play from portal 2!

item.title: [+1667] Unbelievable Performance
item.description: Holy fucking shit, that was the most amazing﻿ thing I have ever seen.

item.title: [+1572] What Does Porn & Disney Have In Common? [comic]
[+1388] Saw this last night in Hollywood. It made me smile. (PIC)
[+1339] WikiLeaks Founder Has Classified Afghan. Massacre Video
item.description: After several days underground, the founder of the secretive website WikiLeaks has gone public to disclose that he is preparing to release a classified Pentagon video of a U.S. airstrike in Afghanistan last year that left as many as 140 civilians dead, most of them children and teenagers.

item.title: [+1290] The 'God particle' may exist in FIVE forms collider finds
item.description: The elusive 'God particle' - or Higgs boson - being sought in the Large Hadron Collider may exist in multiple forms, according to a new study.

item.title: [+1257] Hey, guys... (COMIC)
item.description: OlasNich has nailed our collective frustrations perfectly.

item.title: [+1131] What it's like to own an Apple product - The Oatmeal
item.description: An illustrated journey on the emotional rollercoaster of owning something fancy from Apple.

item.title: [+1002] I have to admit, it would work on me [Comic]
[+966] Conan's triumphant arrival at TBS (video)
item.description: Arriving at the TBS offices after months on tour, Conan O'Brien is greeted like a hometown hero...

item.title: [+926] Tortoise helps a friend
item.description: With good friends you don't have to worry.

item.title: [+871] The Happiest Goose in the World
item.description: What a perky little fella, for a animal whose species is known for an extremely high occurrence of duck rape!

item.title: [+862] Dell says Ubuntu is safer than Windows
item.description: So, does this end the debate over what the safest OS is? Not by a long shot. Nice bragging rights, though.

item.title: [+662] BP's Nightmare Well: Internal Documents Uncover Negligence
item.description: In an e-mail written six days before the Deepwater Horizon explosion, a BP engineer called the well a "nightmare." The e-mail was released Monday by the House Committee on Energy and Commerce, and it's one of many company documents describing the risky, cost-cutting decisions that preceded the disaster.

item.title: [+609] 6 reasons it took 11 years for you to see Toy Story 3
item.description: 11 years ago, Toy Story 2 made grown men cry when Jessie the cowgirl sang that Sarah McLachlan song about getting left behind. It even ended on the most bittersweet note possible.

item.title: [+599] Area Grandmother Comes Forward As 'Banksy'
item.description: At a press conference Tuesday, 89-year-old Rose Biggin, a grandmother from the Camden Town neighborhood of North London, announced that she was in fact the internationally renowned graffiti artist known only as Banksy.

item.title: [+591] Man Crushed By Furnace Saws His Arm Off
item.description: Jonathan Metz, who sawed through his arm after it was stuck in a boiler for two days, got a new boiler installed Monday, free of charge.
